title: Catholic, Reluctantly
description: George Peterson would rather wrestle at a big high school, but he has to go to a new school run by Catholic John Paul 2 High. Only seven kids in the whole school! The building is falling apart. Weird things keep happening. And then there s Allie Weaver, drop-dead gorgeous, barely Catholic. Why did her parents suddenly transfer her to John Paul 2 High? And what is she so afraid of?
author: Christian M. Frank
